123450.「アタシ 古代の釜に ふれるのが\n 三度のメシより 好きなんだけど\n なんと:
I love working with ancient kettles more than anything else, but I'm wondering if there's any way I can make a living at it. I don't
have the knowledge to fix a broken kettle, but I'm good with my hands, so I'm just wondering if I can make use of that...

123451.「<%sL_PRISM>に\n フォルムチェンジするんだね？\n<yesno><:
You're going to change your form to
<%sL_PRISM>, aren't you?<yesno><close>

123452.「<%sL_PRISM>の\n <%sL_SLOT>の部分を\n <%sL_C_:
So you want to color the <%sL_SLOT> part of
<%sL_PRISM> to <%sL_C_COLOR>? Then I need 10
<%sL_ITEM> and <%nL_GOLD> gold, okay?<yesno><break>

123453.「元の色に戻すで いいのかな？\n<yesno><break>: Is it okay if I restore the original color?<yesno><break>

123454.「それだと 今と変わらないよ？\n 他のものを チョイスしてね！\n<end>:
That's not going to change anything, is it?
You're gonna have to choose something else!<end>

123456.「この色では ないんだね。\n それなら 他の色を チョイスしてね。:
It's not this color. Then I'll choose another
color...

123457.「こんにちはっ。釜デコ屋のヤシムだよ！\n さーて 今日は なんの用かな？\n<:
Hi... It's Yasim from the Kama De Koko Shop!
So, what can I do for you today?<break>

123458.「了解っ！ じゃあ その色をつけるよ！: You got it! Then I'll put that color on!

123459.「……やったー！\n ナイスなカラーに ペイントできたよー！\n<br>\n「他:
... I did it! I painted it a nice color! Are
there any other parts you'd like to color?

123461.「……よし！ 元の色に戻ったよ！\n<br>\n「他にも カラーリングしたい部分:
... Okay! I'm back to my original color! Is
there any other part of the body you'd like
to color?

123462.「釜の フォルムは\n さくせんコマンドの いろいろ設定以下にある\n 『錬金釜:
The form of the cauldron can also be changed from the "Alchemy Cauldron Settings" under the various settings in the Operation
command... When you get a new cauldron prism, please come back to see me!

123464.錬金釜のフォルムを\n元のフォルムに 戻した！:
The alchemy cauldron's form has reverted to
its original form!

123466.「さーて 今日は 何の用かな？\n<end>: So, what can I do for you today?<end>

123467.「むぎゅ…… なんだか胸がドキドキしてきたよ。\n さては キミ 釜フォルムのニ:
I can't help it. My heart is pounding... So, you have a new mode of kettle form, do you? Attach it to your cauldron, and you'll be
able to change the appearance of your cauldron to a new mode! Of course, you can always go back to the original form, and
changing the form won't affect the performance of the kettle, so don't worry about that. Let's try installing <%sL_PRISM>
on your kettle.

123468.「むむむー 残念。\n また気が向いたら その時は よろしくね！:
Mmmm... If you're ever in the mood, I'd love
to meet you!

123469.「いやっふうーー！\n それじゃ キミの釜を 新たな世界に ご招待！\n レッツ:
Yoo-hoo! Then I invite you to enter a new
world! Let's Prism Newcomer!<end>

123470.<%sL_PRISM>が 取り付けられて\n錬金釜のフォルムが ひとつ増えた！\:
The <%sL_PRISM> has been installed, giving
the alchemy cauldron one more form!<me_71><end>

123471.「ふー。これで キミの釜は 新しいフォルムに\n チェンジできるようになったよ。:
Phew. Now your cauldron can change to a new
form. Okay, I'll continue... Is there
anything else I can do for you?<break>

123472.「こんにちはっ。ボク ヤシム。\n 錬金釜界の ファッションリーダーにして\n:
I... I'm ... I'm Yasim, the fashion leader of the alchemy cauldron world and top cauldron stylist! I can't... As soon as you
approached, my heart suddenly started pounding... So, you have your own kettle. I can change the color of your kettle, change
its shape, and do all sorts of other things, so please take care of me.

123473.「あちゃ～ 素材が足りないみたいだね。: It looks like we're out of material...

123475.「悪いけど キミの釜は\n まだ 釜プリズムを 取り付けていないから\n フォル:
I'm sorry, but your kettle doesn't have a kettle prism installed, so you can't change its shape. If you do find a Kettle Prism
somewhere, I'll be sure to install one in your kettle, just so you'll remember!

123476.「もし どこかで 釜プリズムっていう\n 貴重品を 手に入れたなら\n ボクのと:
If you happen to come into possession of the priceless Kettle Prism, bring it to me... And I'll make your kettle even more beautiful and
coordinated!

123477.「こんにちはっ。ボク ヤシム。\n 錬金釜界の ファッションリーダーにして\n:
I... I'm ... I'm Yasim, the fashion leader and top kettle stylist of the alchemy kettle world! If you have your own cauldron, I can
change its color, change its shape, and let you enjoy the dizzying world of cauldrons.

123478.「それだと 今の色と変わらないよ？\n 他の色を チョイスしてね。:
That's the same color as the one we have now,
right? We can choose another color...

123479.「なんについての 説明が聞きたいのかな？\n<select_se_off>\nカ:
What do you want an explanation for?
<select_se_off>
About coloring
About Form Change
<select_end><break>

123480.「カラーリングは キミの釜を\n 様々な色に 変更できるサービスだよ！\n<br:
Coloring is a service that allows you to change your cauldron to a variety of colors! To color your kettle, you'll need to pay a
fee, and you'll also need some materials to color it. If you want to change it back to its original color, you'll have to pay...

123481.「フォルムチェンジは\n キミの釜の フォルムを 無料で\n 好きなものに 変更:
Form Change is a service that allows you to change the form of your kettle to anything you like, free of charge! However, you must
have at least one Kama Prism installed in your kettle before you can change it, so be careful.

123482.「ということで\n さーて 今日は なんの用かな？\n<break>: So... what can I do for you today?<break>
